bullets.text: US shutdown risk persists; Trump meets congressional leaders, threatens federal firings; markets cautious, futures flat, Asia mixed; shutdown seen as near-term equity headwind.
GOP leaders shelve Obamacare tax credit fight to avert shutdown, signaling pragmatic compromise priority over ideological battles.
Comey indictment sets retribution precedent, escalating perceived politicization of justice and potential governance risk for allies and markets.
Planned troop deployment to Portland over protests heightens federal-state tensions and domestic instability risk.
US wielding state power to back critical mineral firms; rare earths and lithium names could be next beneficiaries of industrial policy.
JD Vance claims TikTok is successfully separated from ByteDance, potentially reducing China exposure risk and validating forced divestiture playbook.
DJI loses suit over U.S. 'Chinese military company' label, keeping restrictions intact and underscoring deepening tech decoupling.
China's MSS-linked 'Salt Typhoon' shows expanding cyber-espionage capacity, elevating corporate IP theft and critical infrastructure risks globally.
Supermicro server motherboards susceptible to unremovable malware, intensifying hardware supply-chain security concerns for enterprises and hyperscalers.
Moldova's projected pro-EU win weakens Kremlin leverage, bolstering EU integration momentum on Russia's frontier.
Tesla deliveries report will test revived sentiment; outcome likely to move EV valuations, charging ecosystem, and suppliers.
AI boom marked by heavy capex and aggressive dealmaking; signals maturing cycle versus dot-com-style froth, with winners consolidating.
U.S. health officials warn of rising drug-resistant 'nightmare' bacteria, threatening higher healthcare costs and mortality without new antibiotics.
Quantum chips demonstrate real-world readiness, boosting prospects for near-term quantum advantage in optimization and simulation niches.
New inhaler halves childhood asthma attacks in trials, implying substantial public-health impact and potential payer savings.
